name: Beat it 4
description:
Presenting

BEAT IT 4

Story
While the rocks in the portal collapsed, Some of the people came and Most were EVIL

And when teamed, Killed all the people who were not evil, One became the boss, And who didn't obey and wanted to become the boss were killed by the Boss of evil, And you got to know that and tried to find where the portal was, Tried several times, but failed

Can you find the portal?

Can you defeat them all?

Instructions

Use arrow keys to navigate the player

Press Z to Press buttons

Press space to respawn

Press X to change the weapon (While fighting boss)

Credits

Thanks to @-ArvgCoder- (on scracth.mit.edu)for Arrow Physics
Everything else by me
